Nanning is in the south near the Vietnamese border. The museum is small, but has some very rare Baiyue bronze artifacts, and has the world's largest collection of bronze drums. I included at the end some photos of People's Park. Photos by Gary L. Todd, Ph.D., Professor of History, Sias International University, Xinzheng, Henan, China.Â https://picasaweb.google.com/GaryLeeTodd/NanningGuangxiProvincialMuseum#
